page.title: 10OUR SCHOOL CARETAKER.
page.content: Our school caretaker is called Mr. Butters. He has been working in St Joseph's School for three years and four months. He started on March 4th, 1982 on a Thursday. When I went to question Mr. Butters, he said that he really likes his job. He starts at eight o'clock and finishes at six o'clock. His dinner break is from 12 o'clock to 2 o'clock. Sometimes when I go home for dinner he takes me in his car. His wife is the school secretary. He has a son and a daughter. He works from Monday to Friday and rests at the weekend. Mr. Butters has a timetable of what he has to do. Mr. Butters' hobbies are golf and mending motor cars. Our last caretaker was called Mr. Hopper but he died. I like Mr. Butters. He makes sure the school is always nice and tidy.
